xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.3 Saññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 4.3.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 4.3.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
90.
1544Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
1545Anulomaṃ.
<< 4.3.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
